clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text:
The Session has no third-party scripts or cookies: no advertising.
no tracking.
no analytics.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: When you sign up to The Session, you provide some information about yourself. This information will never, ever be shared, sold or given away to anyone.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text:
When you sign up to The Session, you provide a name that you will be known by on the site. I encourage you to use your real name, but you donâ€™t have to.

You can update your username at any time from your member profile.

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: If you no longer want your past contributions attributed to you, you can contact me and request your membership be deactivated.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.
clauses.clause_text: My name is Jeremy. I run The Session. If you need any help, let me know.

case.text: The terms for this service are easy to read
